page.title: 05COTEHILL SCHOOL
page.content: I go to a small school.It only has 37 people in it.You start when you are four years old.Some very little children come on Thursday afternoons.Our school has two classes and three teachers.It has two dinner ladies .One is called Mrs Reed and the other is called Mrs Fullerton.We say prayers before we eat our lunch.We have nice school dinners and sometimes we have ice_cream and hot chocolate. We do cycling tests in the yard.In the small class you start at four years old to seven.Then you start in the other class from seven years old till eleven.Then you go to secondary school.Our school is small compared to my other school in Kenya.In Kenya our school had 500 pupils in it and 30 teachers and 20 workers.
